units.title: Isolation of colonic crypts
units.text: crypts of the healthy portion of the colonic epithelium (at least 10 cm away from the tumor side) were isolated by digestion of the intestinal mucosa in chelation solution (5.6 mM Na2HPO4, 8.0 mM KH2PO4, 96.2 mM NaCl, 1.6 mM KCl, 43.4 mM Sucrose, and 54.9 mM D‑Sorbitol, Sigma) supplemented with dithiothreitol (0.5 mM, Sigma) and EDTA (2 mM, in‑house) for 30 min at 4 °C.
units.rationale: Isolates healthy colonic crypts for organoid generation.

units.title: Plating crypts in basement membrane extract
units.text: Colonic crypts were subsequently plated in basement membrane extract (BME; Cultrex PC BME RGF type 2, Amsbio).
units.rationale: Embeds crypts in a matrix to support 3D growth.

units.title: Organoid culture medium composition
units.text: Organoids were grown in human intestinal stem cell medium (HISCM), which is composed of Advanced Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium/F12 supplemented with penicillin/streptomycin, 10 mM HEPES and Glutamax (all Gibco, Thermo Fisher Scientific) with 50% Wnt3a conditioned medium (in‑house), 20% R‑Spondin1 conditioned medium (in‑house), 10% Noggin conditioned medium (in‑house), 1x B27, 1.25 mM N‑acetylcysteine, 10 mM nicotinamide, 50 ng/ml human EGF, 10 nM Gastrin, 500 nM A83‑01, 3 µM SB202190, 10 nM prostaglandin E2 and 100 µg/ml Primocin (Invivogen).
units.rationale: Provides the defined medium required for organoid maintenance.

units.title: Digestion of tumor biopsies into single cells
units.text: Tumor biopsies were digested into single cells using collagenase II (1 mg/ml, Gibco, Thermo Fisher Scientific), supplemented with hyaluronidase (10 µg/ml) and LY27632 (10 µM) for 30 min at 37 °C while shaking.
units.rationale: Generates single‑cell suspensions from tumor tissue for organoid culture.

units.title: Plating dissociated tumor cells and culture conditions
units.text: Dissociated tumor cells were plated in BME and organoids were cultured in HICS minus Wnt conditioned medium supplemented with 10 µM LY27632 at 37 °C.
units.rationale: Initiates organoid formation from tumor cells under defined conditions.

units.title: Summation of normalized peptide intensities from replicates
units.text: For each peptide, normalized peptide intensities were summed from three replicated measurements by HCD (Exp1), or EThcD (Exp2), respectively.
units.rationale: Quantifies peptide abundance across technical replicates.

units.title: Statistical testing of protein abundance changes
units.text: Significant changes in protein abundance with respect to normal colon organoids were determined based on three technical replicates with a two‑sided student’s t test: *p < 0.05; **p < 0.01.
units.rationale: Determines statistically significant protein level differences.

units.title: Pairwise comparison of ligand intensities
units.text: Ligand intensities from each tumor organoid clone were compared by retention time alignment and label‑free quantification in a pair‑wise manner.
units.rationale: Assesses quantitative variation of ligands between clones.
